items.sentence: I know Tom and Mary have both already left Boston.
I know both Tom and Mary have already left Boston.
Tom told me that he was just trying to be helpful.
You should try not to scratch your mosquito bites.
I don\'t think that I\'ll be able to convince Tom.
Tom had no idea that Mary already had a boyfriend.
Tom had no idea that Mary was planning to do that.
What makes you so sure Tom will want to come back?
Tom caught a virus and had to stay home from work.
You\'re very good at speaking French, aren\'t you?
Tom didn\'t give his phone number to just anybody.
Tom thought he heard some voices in the next room.
Tom told Mary he wanted to get married right away.
Do you know Tom well enough to ask him for a loan?
Tom knew Mary was unlikely to ask John to do that.
Tom asked Mary to leave the key under the doormat.
I didn\'t know how to do this until Tom showed me.
I know that we can count on Tom to do that for us.
I don\'t think this is a good time to talk to Tom.
I don\'t think this rain will let up anytime soon.
